descriptionHtml:
I'm currently working on creating high quality meshes for a knuckle duster, a claw weapon and katar that can be used by unarmed/martial art mods and the likes. These are just blender meshes so someone needs to texture them and add them to the game later on. I do not allow redistribution of the meshes on other places than the nexus however. If you want to use the meshes feel free to as long as you PM me the link of the weapons mod you are going to use them for and give credit in the description.

Done list:
Katar - Elven
Knuckle duster - Iron, Elven,Orcish,Ebony,Glass,Dragonbone,Steel,Wood
Claw weapon - Iron , Steel, Dwemer, Orcish, Ebony, Daedric, Imperial, Silver, Elven,Glass,Dragonbone

I'm new to modding and modelling altogether so if someone wants to correct any errors please contact me. I appreciate all the advice i can get.

Note: I'll be offline for a long while due to finally getting a job and moving so i won't have internet access. You are free to use the models for non-commercial projects as long as i get the credit for the meshes. No need to PM me.
author: BoredManMarc
